DOC.brief_summary: This study is an international, multi-center, open-label study designed to provide oral treprostinil (UT-15C) to eligible subjects with pulmonary arterial hypertension who have completed the TDE-PH-310 study. The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term safety of UT-15C and to assess the effects of long-term treatment with UT-15C on exercise capacity.
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label, Long-Term Study of Oral Treprostinil in Subjects With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Participated in United Therapeutics Study TDEPH310 Premature discontinuation of United Therapeutics Study TDEPH310 due to reasons other than clinical worsening
